name: Create Biochemical Network SBML Model
description: Generate a mathematical model of a biochemical network in SBML format
author: Biomni Synthetic Biology Tools

inputs.name: reaction_network
inputs.description: List of dictionaries, each representing a reaction with keys: id, name, reactants, products, reversible

inputs.name: kinetic_parameters
inputs.description: Dictionary mapping reaction IDs to their kinetic law parameters (law_type, parameters)

inputs.name: output_file
inputs.description: File path to save the SBML model

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Research log summarizing the model creation process
